actions.text: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 189 (Roll no. 108).

description: Amendment provides that the provisions of the bill requiring an automatic stay of execution shall terminate upon the completion of a State court review, unless a substantial showing of a violation of a Federal right can be established.
purpose: An amendment stating that the provisions of the bill requiring an automatic stay of execution shall terminate upon the completion of state court review, unless a substantial showing of a violation of a federal right can be established.
